## How to Join

Interested in joining our collaborative platform? Contact us!

- Website: [Collaborative Platform for Epidemic Modelling and Data Analytics](https://www.rivm.nl/infectieziektebestrijding/modelleren/collaborative-platform-en)

- LinkedIn group: [Epidemic Modelling and Data Analytics](https://www.linkedin.com/groups/13094435/)

- Email: collabforepidemodatanalytics [AT] rivm.nl
